title: Sample Books, 1937
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, paper, celluloid
Technique: printed, compound and double cloth
description: Twenty-three white celluloid binders containing one hundred and nine samples of printed silks. Four binders (v, bb, cc, ee) contain eleven samples of printed linens. Five binders (g, j, k, p, r) contain twenty-three samples of compound cloth. One binder (gg) contains six samples of double cloth. Binders printed in red: "Tissus Haute Couture Incorporated. Olré of Paris."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Books, 1937. Medium: silk, linen, paper, celluloid
Technique: printed, compound and double cloth. Gift of Edith Wetmore. 1937-74-8-a/z.
